original_title: NPP wins 4 seats, SJB secures one in Polonnaruwa District
original_body_lines: The Election Commission of Sri Lanka has released the final results of the Polonnaruwa District in the 2024 General Election with the National People’s Power (NPP) polling more than 68.67% of the total votes in the district.
NPP has polled 159,010 votes to win the district while the Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB) is second with 43,822 votes (18.92%).
Accordingly, the NPP has secured 05 seats in the district while the SJB and the SLPP have won a seat each in the district.
